message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $10000. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll find it's a great value.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, but I have to make a living too. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9000. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit below budget. I'd be willing to pay $8000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
